title: Does Code === Free Speech?
description: When the FBI asked Apple, following the 2015 mass shooting in San Bernardino, to write code that would give the FBI access to a suspect's iPhone - Apple refused, arguing that forcing it to write code goes against the First Amendment. Apple's claim wasn't the first time that this highly controversial claim was invoked in judicial proceedings…
